info.title: Magnetism
info.description: The game is available (as long as we keep it up-to-date) as a Realm adventure map for anyone who owns a Realm on Minecraft Java Edition.

solution.title: Show solution
solution.description: If you get stuck on a puzzle, you can click the "Show Solution" button. Each puzzle stores its solution as an array of numbers, where each number represents a move. For example, [0, 1, 2, 3] corresponds to up, down, left, and right. The real challenge, however, isn't just knowing which moves to make - it's figuring out the right timing for each move.

/project/90gqopen-website.title: 90gQopen website
/project/90gqopen-website.description: This is the website made for one of the largest Swedish Minecraft servers, called 90gQopen. The site provides players with up-to-date information about the server, events, and community resources. The website also integrates with server APIs to display live statistics and offers a platform for players to connect and share their experiences.
